mapper.select: select ds_code, ds_type, ds_form, ds_passive from doc_sort order by ds_flow

select empl_no, empl_pwd, empl_nm,
(select cc_name from common_code where cg_group = 'POSITION' and cc_code = #{emplPosition}) as empl_position, (select dept_name from department where dept_code = #{deptCode}) as dept_code, (select team_name from team where team_code = #{teamCode}) as team_code, empl_signature, TO_CHAR(empl_brthdy, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as empl_brthdy, TO_CHAR(hire_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as hire_date, retire_date, retire_resn, enable, profile_imgpath, basic_salary,bank_code, bank_name, account, zip_code, addr_main, addr_detail, empl_telno, empl_email, empl_hobby, TO_CHAR(empl_mrnry, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as empl_mrnry, householder_at, vehicle_number, empl_gender from employee where empl_no = #{emplNo}
mapper.insert:
select document_seq.nextval from dual
insert into document(doc_no, ds_code, writer_no, doc_title, doc_date, doc_content, doc_period, sanctn_rqstdt, dcrb_allow, doc_apv, file_identify) values(#{docNo}, #{dsCode}, #{writerNo}, #{docTitle}, sysdate, #{docContent}, ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, 36), sysdate, #{dcrbAllow}, '01', #{fileIdentify})
insert into sanctioner (doc_no, sanctner_no, sanctner_act, sanctn_flow, sanctn_status) values(#{docNo}, #{sanctnerNo}, #{sanctnerAct}, #{sanctnFlow}, #{sanctnStatus})
mapper.select: select doc_no, ds_code, writer_no, doc_title, TO_CHAR(doc_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as doc_date, doc_content, doc_remark, doc_period, doc_temp, TO_CHAR(sanctn_rqstdt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as sanctn_rqstdt, dcrb_allow, doc_apv, final_date, file_identify from document where writer_no = #{userId} order by TO_NUMBER(doc_no) desc

select d.doc_no, d.ds_code, (select empl_nm from employee where empl_no = d.writer_no) as writer_no, d.doc_title, d.doc_content, d.doc_period, TO_CHAR(d.sanctn_rqstdt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as sanctn_rqstdt, a.sanctner_no, a.sanctn_status, a.sanctn_date from document d join sanctioner a on d.doc_no = a.doc_no where a.sanctner_no = #{userId} order by TO_NUMBER(doc_no) desc

select d.doc_no, d.ds_code, e.empl_nm as writer_no, d.doc_title, d.doc_content, TO_CHAR(d.doc_period, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as doc_period, d.doc_apv, d.dcrb_allow, TO_CHAR(d.sanctn_rqstdt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as sanctn_rqstdt, (select empl_nm from employee where empl_no = a.sanctner_no) as sanctner_no, (select cc_name from common_code where cc_code = a.sanctn_status and cg_group = 'SANCTN_STATUS') as sanctn_status, a.sanctn_date, a.sanctn_flow, e.empl_position, e.empl_signature from document d join sanctioner a on d.doc_no = a.doc_no join employee e on e.empl_no = d.writer_no where d.doc_no = #{docNo} order by a.sanctn_flow
mapper.update: update sanctioner set sanctn_status = CASE WHEN sanctn_flow = #{sanctnFlow} THEN '05' WHEN sanctn_flow > #{sanctnFlow} THEN '06' ELSE sanctn_status END where doc_no = #{docNo} and sanctn_flow >= #{sanctnFlow}
mapper.insert: insert into history(his_no, empl_no, his_type, his_sdate, his_edate, his_stime, his_etime, his_creatdt) values (history_seq.nextval, #{emplNo}, #{hisType}, TO_DATE(#{hisSdate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{hisEdate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{hisSdate} || ' ' || #{hisStime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), TO_DATE(#{hisEdate} || ' ' || #{hisEtime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), sysdate)
